item.title: DeNetDM: Debiasing by Network Depth Modulation
item.description: DeNetDM uses network depth modulation to automatically debiase image classifiers without bias annotations or data augmentation, improving accuracy by 5%.

item.title: Recognize Any Regions
item.description: RegionSpot efficiently integrates pretrained localization and vision-language models for superior open-world object recognition, achieving significant performance gains with minimal training.
